subject: Boston Marathon
Boston Marathon Bombings (2013)
lead_paragraph: No runners showed more resilience at the Boston Marathon than a group of 28 who were injured in last year’s bombing and ran Monday as a form of therapy and a show of defiance.
snippet: No runners showed more resilience at the Boston Marathon than a group of 28 who were injured in last year’s bombing and ran Monday as a form of therapy and a show of defiance.
